entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Welland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:32 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Welland-Pelham 12:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: SSE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
